text: <@U02CVNB3X1T> For audio books, two of my recent favorites are Cooked, written & read by Michael Pollan, and I Feel Bad About My Neck, written & read by Nora Ephron. About the latter, I listened to it when I was grieving my mother who I wasn't especially close to, and it gave me some odd moments of comfort and a lot of lightheartedness. (If you can't stand a NYC accent, it might not be for you.)
